trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Split-Path
trans-unit.target: Split-Path

trans-unit.source: Split-Path
trans-unit.target: Split-Path

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 简述

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified part of a path.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定的路径部分。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: ParentSet (Default)
trans-unit.target: ParentSet （默认值）

trans-unit.source: IsAbsoluteSet
trans-unit.target: IsAbsoluteSet

trans-unit.source: LeafSet
trans-unit.target: LeafSet

trans-unit.source: QualifierSet
trans-unit.target: QualifierSet

trans-unit.source: NoQualifierSet
trans-unit.target: NoQualifierSet

trans-unit.source: LiteralPathSet
trans-unit.target: LiteralPathSet

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The Split-Path cmdlet returns only the specified part of a path, such as the parent directory, a child directory, or a file name.
trans-unit.target: Split-Path cmdlet 仅返回路径的指定部分，如父目录、子目录或文件名。

trans-unit.source: It can also get items that are referenced by the split path and tell whether the path is relative or absolute.
trans-unit.target: 它也可以获取拆分路径所引用的项，并指示该路径是相对路径还是绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: You can use this cmdlet to get or submit only a selected part of a path.
trans-unit.target: 使用此 cmdlet 可以只获取或只提交路径的选定部分。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: This command returns only the qualifier (the drive) of the path.
trans-unit.target: 此命令只返回路径的限定符（驱动器）。

trans-unit.source: This command displays the files that are referenced by the split path.
trans-unit.target: 此命令显示拆分路径所引用的文件。

trans-unit.source: Because this path is split to the last item (the "leaf"), only the file names of the paths are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 因为此路径拆分至最后一项（“叶”），所以将仅显示路径的文件名。

trans-unit.source: The Resolve parameter tells Split-Path to display the items that the split path references, instead of displaying the split path.
trans-unit.target: Resolve 参数指示 Split-Path 显示拆分路径所引用的项，而不是显示拆分路径。

trans-unit.source: Like all Split-Path commands, this command returns strings.
trans-unit.target: 与所有 Split-Path 命令一样，此命令也返回字符串，

trans-unit.source: It does not return FileInfo Objects representing the files.
trans-unit.target: 而不返回表示文件的 FileInfo 对象。

trans-unit.source: This command returns only the parent containers of the path.
trans-unit.target: 此命令只返回路径的父容器。

trans-unit.source: Because it does not include any parameters to specify the split, Split-Path uses the split location default, which is Parent.
trans-unit.target: 因为不包括任何用于指定拆分的参数，所以 Split-Path 将使用拆分位置默认值 Parent。

trans-unit.source: This command determines whether the path is relative or absolute.
trans-unit.target: 此命令确定路径是相对路径还是绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: In this case, because the path is relative to the current directory, which is represented by a dot (.), it returns FALSE ($false).
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，由于路径相对于由点 (.) 表示的当前目录，因此该命令返回 FALSE ($false)。

trans-unit.source: This command changes your location to the directory that contains the Windows PowerShell profile.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将当前位置更改为包含 Windows PowerShell 配置文件的目录。

trans-unit.source: The command in parentheses uses the Split-Path cmdlet to return only the parent of the path stored in the built-in $Profile variable.
trans-unit.target: 圆括号中的命令使用 Split-Path cmdlet 来只返回内置 $Profile 变量中存储的路径的父项。

trans-unit.source: (The Parent parameter is the default split location parameter, so you can omit it from the command.) The parentheses direct Windows PowerShell to run the command first.
trans-unit.target: （Parent 参数为默认的拆分位置参数，因此可以在命令中省略该参数。）圆括号指示 Windows PowerShell 先运行该命令。

trans-unit.source: This is a handy way to navigate to a directory with a long path name.
trans-unit.target: 通过此方式，可以便捷地导航到具有长路径名的目录。

trans-unit.source: This command uses a pipeline operator (|) to send a path to the Split-Path cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 此命令使用管道运算符 (|) 将路径发送给 Split-Path cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: The path is enclosed in quotation marks to indicate that it is a single token.
trans-unit.target: 路径用引号引起以指示它是一个标记。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: -Credential
trans-unit.target: -Credential

trans-unit.source: Specifies a user account that has permission to perform this action.
trans-unit.target: 指定有权执行此操作的用户帐户。

trans-unit.source: The default is the current user.
trans-unit.target: 默认为当前用户。

trans-unit.source: Type a user name, such as "User01" or "Domain01\User01".
trans-unit.target: 键入用户名，例如“User01”或“Domain01\User01”。

trans-unit.source: Or, enter a PSCredential object, such as one generated by the Get-Credential cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 或者，输入 PSCredential 对象，例如由 Get-Credential cmdlet 生成的对象。

trans-unit.source: If you type a user name, you will be prompted for a password.
trans-unit.target: 如果键入用户名，则将提示你输入密码。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not supported by any providers installed with Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 随同 Windows PowerShell 一起安装的任何提供程序都不支持此参数。

trans-unit.source: -IsAbsolute
trans-unit.target: -IsAbsolute

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE ($True) if the path is absolute and FALSE ($False) if it is relative.
trans-unit.target: 如果路径为绝对路径，则返回 TRUE ($True)；如果其为相对路径，则返回 FALSE ($False)。

trans-unit.source: An absolute path has a length greater than zero and does not use a dot ( .
trans-unit.target: 绝对路径的长度大于零，并且不使用点 ( . ) 来

trans-unit.source: ) to indicate the current path.
trans-unit.target: 指示当前路径。

trans-unit.source: -Leaf
trans-unit.target: 叶

trans-unit.source: Returns only the last item or container in the path.
trans-unit.target: 只返回路径中的最后一项或最后一个容器。

trans-unit.source: For example, in the path "C:\Test\Logs\Pass1.log", it returns only "Pass1.log".
trans-unit.target: 例如，在路径“C:\Test\Logs\Pass1.log”中，该命令仅返回“Pass1.log”。

trans-unit.source: -LiteralPath
trans-unit.target: -LiteralPath

trans-unit.source: Specifies the paths to be split.
trans-unit.target: 指定要拆分的路径。

trans-unit.source: Unlike Path, the value of LiteralPath is used exactly as it is typed.
trans-unit.target: 与 Path 不同，LiteralPath 的值严格按照所键入的形式使用。

trans-unit.source: No characters are interpreted as wildcards.
trans-unit.target: 不会将任何字符解释为通配符。

trans-unit.source: If the path includes escape characters, enclose it in single quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 如果路径包括转义符，请将其括在单引号中。

trans-unit.source: Single quotation marks tell Windows PowerShell not to interpret any characters as escape sequences.
trans-unit.target: 单引号会告知 Windows PowerShell 不要将所有字符都解释为转义序列。

trans-unit.source: -NoQualifier
trans-unit.target: -NoQualifier

trans-unit.source: Returns the path without the qualifier.
trans-unit.target: 返回无限定符的路径。

trans-unit.source: For the FileSystem or registry providers, the qualifier is the drive of the provider path, such as C: or HKCU:.
trans-unit.target: 对于 FileSystem 或 Registry 提供程序，限定符是提供程序路径的驱动器，例如，C: 或 HKCU:。

trans-unit.source: For example, in the path "C:\Test\Logs\Pass1.log", it returns only "\Test\Logs\Pass1.log".
trans-unit.target: 例如，在路径“C:\Test\Logs\Pass1.log”中，该命令仅返回“\Test\Logs\Pass1.log”。

trans-unit.source: -Parent
trans-unit.target: -父

trans-unit.source: Returns only the parent containers of the item or of the container specified by the path.
trans-unit.target: 只返回路径所指定的项或容器的父容器。

trans-unit.source: For example, in the path "C:\Test\Logs\Pass1.log", it returns "C:\Test\Logs".
trans-unit.target: 例如，在路径“C:\Test\Logs\Pass1.log”中，该命令返回“C:\Test\Logs”。

trans-unit.source: The Parent parameter is the default split location parameter.
trans-unit.target: Parent 参数是默认的拆分位置参数。

trans-unit.source: -Path
trans-unit.target: -Path

trans-unit.source: Specifies the paths to be split.
trans-unit.target: 指定要拆分的路径。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允许使用通配符。

trans-unit.source: If the path includes spaces, enclose it in quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 如果路径包括空格，请将其括在引号中。

trans-unit.source: You can also pipe a path to Split-Path.
trans-unit.target: 还可以将路径通过管道传递给 Split-Path。

trans-unit.source: -Qualifier
trans-unit.target: 限定符

trans-unit.source: Returns only the qualifier of the specified path.
trans-unit.target: 只返回指定路径的限定符。

trans-unit.source: For the FileSystem or registry providers, the qualifier is the drive of the provider path, such as C: or HKCU:.
trans-unit.target: 对于 FileSystem 或 Registry 提供程序，限定符是提供程序路径的驱动器，例如，C: 或 HKCU:。

trans-unit.source: -Resolve
trans-unit.target: 解决

trans-unit.source: Displays the items that are referenced by the resulting split path instead of displaying the path elements.
trans-unit.target: 显示生成的拆分路径所引用的项，而不是显示路径元素。

trans-unit.source: -UseTransaction
trans-unit.target: -UseTransaction

trans-unit.source: Includes the command in the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 在活动事务中使用该命令。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can only be used when a transaction is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 仅当正在执行事务时，才使用此参数。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Transactions.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_Transactions。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输入

trans-unit.source: System.String
trans-unit.target: System.String

trans-unit.source: You can pipe a string that contains a path to Split-Path.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过管道将包含路径的字符串传递给 Split-Path。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输出

trans-unit.source: System.String, System.Boolean
trans-unit.target: System.String System.Boolean

trans-unit.source: The **Split-Path** cmdlet returns text strings.
trans-unit.target: **Split-path** cmdlet 将返回文本字符串。

trans-unit.source: When you use the **Resolve** parameter, Split-Path returns a string that describes the location of the items; it does not return objects that represent the items, such as a FileInfo or RegistryKey object.
trans-unit.target: 当您使用 **解决** 参数，拆分路径将返回一个字符串，描述项的位置; 它不返回这些对象表示的项，如 FileInfo 或 RegistryKey 对象。

trans-unit.source: When you use the **IsAbsolute** parameter, **Split-Path** returns a Boolean value.
trans-unit.target: 当您使用 **IsAbsolute** 参数， **Split-path** 返回一个布尔值。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The split location parameters (Qualifier, Parent, Leaf, and NoQualifier) are exclusive.
trans-unit.target: 拆分位置参数（Qualifier、Parent、Leaf 和 NoQualifier）是互斥的。

trans-unit.source: You can use only one in each command.
trans-unit.target: 在每个命令中只能使用一个参数。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlets that contain the Path noun (the Path cmdlets) manipulate path names and return the names in a concise format that all Windows PowerShell providers can interpret.
trans-unit.target: 包含 Path 名词的 cmdlet (Path cmdlet) 采用路径名称作为参数，以所有 Windows PowerShell 提供程序都能够解释的简明格式返回名称。

trans-unit.source: They are designed for use in programs and scripts where you want to display all or part of a path name in a particular format.
trans-unit.target: 这些 cmdlet 用于需要在其中以特定格式显示全部或部分路径名称的程序或脚本中。

trans-unit.source: Use them like you would use Dirname, Normpath, Realpath, Join, or other path manipulators.
trans-unit.target: 你可以像使用 Dirname、Normpath、Realpath、Join 或其他路径操作程序那样使用这些 cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: You can use the Path cmdlets with several providers, including the FileSystem, Registry, and Certificate providers.
trans-unit.target: 可以将路径 cmdlet 与某些提供程序一起使用，包括 FileSystem、Registry 和 Certificate 提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The Split-Path cmdlet is designed to work with the data exposed by any provider.
trans-unit.target: Split-Path cmdlet 可使用由任何提供程序公开的数据。

trans-unit.source: To list the providers available in your session, type "Get-PSProvider".
trans-unit.target: 若要列出会话中可用的提供程序，请键入“Get-PSProvider”。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Providers.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_Providers。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相关的链接

trans-unit.target: Convert-Path

trans-unit.target: Join-Path

trans-unit.target: Resolve-Path

trans-unit.target: Test-Path
